purpose: To provide a curated collection of resources, libraries, and tools for developers interested in building node-based UIs
principle: Aggregates and categorizes resources related to node-based UI design and development, serving as a centralized knowledge base
reusability: Open source and community-driven, allowing contributions and easy access to a wide range of node-based UI resources
limitations: Primarily a list of resources; does not include actual implementation or code examples
name: awesome-node-based-uis
description: A curated list with resources about node-based UIs
highlight: Comprehensive list of resources and tools for creating node-based user interfaces
